author: Simon Difford
description: Scotch soured with lime (works better than lemon) and sweetened with a touch of chocolate liqueur.
name: Moo'lata
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Dark crème de cacao liqueur
7.5 ml White crème de cacao liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
